utils

generics.utils

Various Utilities for CaML.

This module provides various utilities for CaML.

Functions

Name Description
is_module_available Check if a module is available.

is_module_available

generics.utils.is_module_available(module_name)

Check if a module is available.

Parameters

Name Type Description Default
module_name str The name of the module to check. required

Returns

Name Type Description
bool True if the module is available, False otherwise.
